ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed Cheddar cheese soup
des: "This is a delicious and easy recipe that's great on cold winter days. I always use fresh ingredients when possible but you can use frozen or canned items if you wish."
ins: In a large pot, mix the water, broccoli, mushrooms, and butter. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer 5 minutes, until broccoli is tender. Mix in milk powder, soup, hot sauce, pepper, and garlic powder. Continue cooking, stirring frequently, until heated through.
